## Maunga Whau Volcano

```{r volcano, message = FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(datasets)
library(plotly)
data("volcano")
plot_ly(x = row(volcano) * 10, y = col(volcano) * 10, z = volcano * 10,  type = "surface") %>%
layout(title = "Topographic map of Maunga Whau", showlegend = FALSE)
```
